description.p: You are a member of a secret organization dedicated to understanding and manipulating the natural world for the betterment of humanity. Whether you are a trained hunter, a skilled tracker, or a trusted messenger, you have been selected to work for the Commission because of your unique abilities and your unwavering loyalty to the cause.

ul.li: Tool Proficiencies: Smith's Tools or Tinker's Tools
Equipment: A set of artisan's tools (one of your choice), a shovel, an iron pot, a set of common clothes, and a belt pouch containing 10 gp

b.big: As a member of the Helix Commission you are granted additional features:

setters.set: Athletics, Survival, Smith's Tools/Tinker's Tools, 1 Language

select.name: Personality Trait
select.item: As a member of the Helix Commission, you have access to advanced experimental equipment and resources not available to the public. You can use this equipment to enhance your weapons and armor, craft unique items, or conduct research on monsters and their behaviors (work with your DM to determine what these might be).
I am convinced that any monster can be tamed and trained with the right approach.
I am obsessed with perfecting my craft and pushing the boundaries of what is possible.
I am always prepared and equipped for any situation.
I have a keen eye for detail and can spot even the slightest anomaly.
I am always looking for ways to improve my skills and abilities.
I am a natural leader and can inspire those around me to action.
I am curious and constantly seeking new knowledge and experiences.

select.name: Ideal
select.item: Knowledge. The pursuit of knowledge is worth any sacrifice. (Neutral)
Control. I seek to control the monster population through study and manipulation. (Lawful)
Responsibility. I understand the importance of my role in the Helix Commission and take it very seriously. (Any)
Innovation. I believe in pushing the boundaries of science and discovery, even if it means taking risks. (Chaotic)
Loyalty. I am devoted to the Helix Commission and will do whatever it takes to protect its secrets and goals. (Neutral)
Progress. I believe in constantly improving and advancing, both in my own abilities and in the field of monster research. (Any)

select.name: Bond
select.item: I owe a debt of loyalty to the Helix Commission and will do whatever it takes to protect its secrets.
I have a close friend or family member who was harmed by a monster, and I seek to prevent that from happening to others.
I am indebted to a senior member of the Helix Commission who trained and mentored me.
I have a deep respect for my fellow agents and will go to great lengths to protect them.
I have a long-standing rivalry with another agent in the Helix Commission, and constantly strive to outdo them and prove myself superior.
I have a personal vendetta against a rival organization or individual who opposes the goals of the Helix Commission.

select.name: Flaw
select.item: I have infiltrated the helix commission, but I am starting to see the benefits they provide.
I am willing to take extreme measures to achieve my goals, even if it means putting innocent lives at risk.
I struggle to control my temper when provoked and can become aggressive or violent.
I have a weakness for acquiring and experimenting with forbidden technology before I really understand it.
I struggle with the ethical implications of my work and often question whether the ends justify the means.
I am willing to sacrifice innocent lives for the sake of my research.

description.p: You have connections to the Helix Commission and can call on its resources for assistance. When you arrive in a new town or city, you can contact a member of the Commission to provide you with information about the local monster population, or to request assistance with capturing a specific target. However, be warned that the Commission is not always popular and your association with it may draw unwanted attention or suspicion.
